node.title: 'He is going to hurt': England wicketkeeper's night to forget after dropping catch 'no Test keeper' should miss
node.description: It was a catch that he "would have been expected to take every single time" and something "no Test keeper" should be dropping, but Jos Buttler couldn't find anywhere to hide in Adelaide.
node.content:
["It was a catch that England wicketkeeper Jos Buttler\u00a0\"would have been expected to take every single time\" and something \"no Test keeper\" should be dropping.", "After a day of grind in the field on\u00a0the opening day in Adelaide,\u00a0England should have been celebrating the prized scalp of Australian batsman Marnus Labuschagne for 95 just before stumps.", "Having just taken the new ball, paceman James Anderson found an edge and it carried through just to Buttler's right at chest\u00a0height.", "To the disbelief of his teammates, the crowd, the Australian team and the commentators, he put it down.", "\"Buttler dropped one he would have been expected to take every single time,\" Fox Sports commentator Mark Howard said.", "\"Late in the day, the edge comes, it hits the keeper's gloves and it hits the deck.\"", "\"There is no Test keeper who should be dropping that,\" ABC Sport commentator Andrew Moore said.", "", "
Buttler, his teammates, the crowd and commentators were in disbelief.(AP: James Elsby)
", "Labuschagne, who had been dropped by\u00a0Buttler in a difficult chance earlier in the day, also couldn't believe his luck.", "\"A few prayers up there, because I don't know how that happened,\" the Australia batsman said.", "\"It's a bit of disbelief, but my job is to make sure I capitalise on that now.", "\"I gave him a chance there and I gave him a chance when I was on about 60 down leg, so I've got to make sure I don't give him any chances tomorrow.\"", "Legendary Australian spinner Shane Warne said it took the shine away from Buttler's stellar diving effort to dismiss Marcus Harris earlier in the day.", "\"You've got to feel for Jos Buttler, he's actually hardly made a mistake,\" Warne said.", "\"He took an absolute screamer and everything has gone in the middle of his gloves.", "\"He had one tough one that he didn't\u00a0quite hang on to and then this one, it's\u00a0regulation [for] an international keeper.", "\"You'll get them 999 times out of 1,000.\"", "", "
Jos Buttler couldn't find a hole to hide in late in the day's play.(AP: James Elsby)
", "Buttler drew ironic cheers from the crowd after the next two deliveries that came through to him,\u00a0but England assistant coach Graham Thorpe said the keeper\u00a0needed to come back and respond.", "\"Jos, he is going to hurt,\" Thorpe said.", "\"But he's going to have to get out of bed and come again and enjoy his day [Friday] because that is what Test cricket is all about.", "\"Everyone \u2026 who has played this game [who] drops a catch, is always disappointed.", "\"But he's a human being \u2026 you can keep magnificently throughout the day but if you drop a catch, it gets highlighted.", "\"We will get around him and try to be philosophical about it as well because I think you have to be.\""]
